definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: refine, purify (Aram. [[זְקַק]]; perh. kindr. with As. zaḳiḳu, wind, Asrb:Annals vi. 64 and Aram. ziyqo0, [[זִיקָּא]] violent wind, violent rain with whirlwind)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יׇזׁ֫קּוּ]] Job 28:1 obj. [[זׇהָב]], Job 36:27 obj. [[מָטָר]] (v. Di).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְזִקַּק]] consec. Mal 3:3 (‖[[וְטִהַר]]) fig., of purifying sons of Levi, like gold and silver [[כְּזׇהָב]] etc.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְזֻקָּק]] refined, of gold 1Ch 28:18, of silver 1Ch 29:4: Ps 12:7 ([[שׁבעתים]] ´[[מ]]); of settled wines [[שְׁמָרִים מְזֻקָּקִים]] Is 25:6.
